summary: This appears to be a header or cover page for a document, likely an internal email or memo, referencing a news story about Jeffrey Epstein's ex-cop cellmate claiming to have saved him from hanging. It originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references a news story about his ex-cop cellmate claiming to have saved him from a hanging incident while incarcerated.

events.title: Cellmate Saves Epstein from Hanging
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's ex-cop cellmate claims to have saved the multimillionaire sex offender from hanging while they were incarcerated together.

locations.address: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: The federal prison facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held and where the alleged hanging incident occurred.

keyFacts: The document references a claim by Jeffrey Epstein's ex-cop cellmate that he saved Epstein from hanging.
The document originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, where Epstein was held.
The document is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and appears to be an internal DOJ/FBI communication header.
